thread.title: Yes Papa Penny, but what exactly are 'spiritual diamonds'?
thread.title_full: Yes Papa Penny, but what exactly are 'spiritual diamonds'? - Times LIVE

author: TshisaLIVE
title: Yes Papa Penny, but what exactly are 'spiritual diamonds'?
text:
Yes Papa Penny, but what exactly are 'spiritual diamonds'? TshisaLIVE | 23 February, 2017 11:36 Papa Penny gave us a lesson in new school spirituality.
Image by: Instagram We must admit we were as lost as Papa Penny's designer at the mention of "spiritual bling" but we rewatched so we could understand exactly what he meant. Cassper to perform at Israeli Apartheid Week concert There is nothing that can hurt me, says AKA Guaped! Somizi travels with a cooler box filled with expensive champers WATCH: Oros mampofu stars in a gripping movie as a miner Papa Penny always has extravagant outfits designed ahead of any occasion. On this episode he had a black suit that had feathers (aka chicken fly that made him feel like he is flying) and a touch of diamonds that he explained is "very important."
Ntsiki is crushing hard on the People's Bae no.2
So according to Papa Penny, these particular diamonds are not "black diamonds" nor are they "blood diamonds". They are what he termed "spiritual diamonds.".
What do they do? Well, these diamonds are responsible for "keeping your spiritual energies in balance".
Cassper to perform at Israeli Apartheid Week concert Mzansi Magic came to our rescue as they clarified through a tweet that "spiritual diamonds" are "what can only be described as a form of new age spirituality" in Papa Penny's world.
Who taught #PapaPennyAhee all these spiritual diamond theories? pic.twitter.com/UjR92BuB9Q
— Richporter (@SthembisoZondi0) February 22, 2017 Papa Penny Ahee fans embraced the knowledge shared by the legendary musician. Well here's to more lessons then!
I'm going to start wearing bling now. According to Papa Penny when you were it you attract spiritual energy #PapaPennyAhee
— Karabo Mokgoko (@Karabo_Mokgoko) February 22, 2017 #PapaPennyAhee spiritual technology , attract us buti pic.twitter.com/wLjtYyTgIy
— Lisa (@Monalisadlamini) February 22, 2017
